subject: URGENT: Verify Your Account Now
body_preview: Dear Customer, Your account has been suspended...
body_full: Dear Customer, Your account has been suspended due to suspicious activity. Click here immediately to verify: http://192.168.1.1/verify?user=123. Failure to verify within 24 hours will result in permanent account closure.

subject: Team Meeting Tomorrow
body_preview: Hi Team, Just a reminder about our meeting...
body_full: Hi Team, Just a reminder about our weekly meeting tomorrow at 10 AM in Conference Room B. Please bring your status updates. Thanks!
